snippet: A motorcycle detonated near an Afghan intelligence directorate office in southern Afghanistan on Wednesday, killing one security official and injuring two others.

byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and GRAHAM BOWLEY
byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah reported from Kandahar, Afghanistan, and Graham Bowley from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: A motorcycle detonated near an Afghan intelligence directorate office in southern Afghanistan on Wednesday, killing one security official and injuring two others.

headline.seo: Bombers Strike Twice in Southern Afghanistan
headline.main: Bombers Strike Twice in Southern Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Bombers Strike Twice in Southern Afghanistan
